def list_policies(scope): """ Lists the policies in the current account.
:param scope: Limits the kinds of policies that are returned. For example, 'Local' specifies that only locally managed policies are returned. :return: The list of policies. """ try: policies = list(iam.policies.filter(Scope=scope)) logger.info("Got %s policies in scope '%s'.", len(policies), scope) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get policies for scope '%s'.", scope) raise else: return policies
